Q1 COMMUNITY BLITZ! |   Event Recording

Watch the videos from our last community meetup: the TRIFECTA - DevOps TLV, Cloud Native & OSS and Statscraft - big thanks to JFrog for hosting!



SPONSOR EVENT: From Relational to NoSQL - Why & How? |   Event Recording

While relational databases have been used for decades, and they still are a viable solution for many use cases, many engineers and architects prefer to use NoSQL databases for their numerous advantages over relational databases. In this webinar we’ll discuss the different aspects of migrating from relational databases to NoSQL databases and answer questions.



SPONSOR EVENT: MLOps for Good Hackathon | Iguazio

OUR COMMUNITY FRIENDS FROM IGUAZIO HAVE LAUNCHED A COMMUNITY HACKATHON FOR GOOD, JOIN THE CAUSE LEARN MORE & REGISTER



June Event: Behind the Scenes of Scaling Up with Oribi | EVENT RECORDING

We hosted the super awesome Oribi team for three excellent talks focused on typical challenges with transitioning from a startup to a scaleup and the impact on engineering.



June Event: How to Build a Content Machine |   EVENT RECORDING

We were joined by Ofir Nachmani, IOD Cloud Tech Research & Oren Hacohen, Snyk - to learn about how to build a content machihe, first the methodology, then how to automate all the things, through Programmatic SEO.



April Event: Kubernetes, Microservices, Production, Scale with Aerospike & Playtika |   Event Recording

Microservice architecture is designed to be scalable - but when using service oriented private databases, we might face some real-world challenges when we do. Watch these two excellent talks from Aerospike & Playtika on the ins & outs of scaling with your microservices.



March Event: Community Blitz Q1 |   Event Recording

Join our three awesome communities - DevOps Tel Aviv, Cloud Native & OSS TLV, and Statscraft for three fantastic sessions in each domain.
